column3: I think this is a symptom of an underlying race condition (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/11777#issuecomment-394364420), so not sure silencing this error is a good idea.\n
I'm not sure you should close it just because of my comment, without any discussion.

Agree that we shouldn't just swallow this error silently.\n\nIf we do decide that it's acceptable for the node to shutdown without responding to a `stop` RPC, then the error catching here should be special cased for just the `stop` command (otherwise we'd miss potential bugs where the node doesn't respond to other RPC methods).
